page.title: 17Art & Crafts in Maylands
page.content: An area rich in{rural hobbies}but done for pleasure rather than profit.{Mill {House Pottery}is a part time hobby, he sells what is produced to cover cost of materials. Will produce to order and only sells from home.Makes domestic stoneware-all thrown. Lady keeps 3 Jacob sheep. She spins and knits all the wool they produce, but garments are only worn by the family. Special occasion cakes made to order and also soft toys supplied to a shop in Frinton.{Other crafts}pursued in the home are patchwork, knitting, copperwork, painting,etc. Adult education classes and the Oakwood Arts Centre in Maldon 6 miles away hold day and evening classes.W.I. grant aided classes held locally on chosen crafts, all give added stimulus.
